channel.title: BaRatin Case Studies on BaRatin - Bayesian Rating Curves
channel.description: Recent content in BaRatin Case Studies on BaRatin - Bayesian Rating Curves

item.title: Ardèche River at Meyras
item.description: 1 Introduction 2 Hydraulic analysis 3 Prior specification 4 Gaugings and posterior rating curve Download the BaRatinAGE file for this case study: Ardeche-Meyras.bam 1 Introduction The Ardèche River at Meyras station is of interest because it illustrates a frequently-encountered 3-control configuration (riffle, main channel, floodway).

item.title: Isère River at Grenoble-Campus
item.description: 1 Hydraulic analysis 2 Prior specification 3 Gaugings and posterior rating curve Download the BaRatinAGE file for this case study: Isere-Grenoble.bam 1 Hydraulic analysis This station can be modeled with a single control as a wide rectangular channel (see Figure below).

item.title: Mercier River at D610 road
item.description: 1 Hydraulic analysis 2 Prior specification 3 Gaugings and posterior rating curve Download the BaRatinAGE file for this case study: Mercier-D610.bam 1 Hydraulic analysis This station is part of the Yzeron observatory monitoring several peri-urban catchments around the city of Lyon since 1997.

item.title: The Charbonnières stream
item.description: 1 Hydraulic analysis 2 Prior specification 3 Gaugings and posterior rating curve 4 Alternative approaches Download the BaRatinAGE file for this case study: Charbonnieres-CharbonnieresLesBains.bam

item.title: Using RBaM
item.description: 1 Introduction 2 Estimation of a BaRatin rating curve 2.1 Defining streamgauging data 2.2 Defining the rating curve model 2.3 Running BaM and exploring MCMC samples 2.
